title: The Adventure Zone: Amnesty Halloween Special!
description: In lieu of a regular episode this week, we've got something truly buckwild (and almost timely) for you: A live, extra scary Halloween installment of The Adventure Zone: Amnesty! Join Duck, Aubrey and Ned as they muster all the courage they can as they enter Kepler's most perilous hunting grounds: Dave's Dehumidifier Depot!
author: shows@themcelroy.family (Travis McElroy, Clint McElroy, Justin McElroy, Griffin McElroy)
